properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 9:52PM EST until February 14 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Lake Effect Snow Will Develop For The Primary Snowbelt
Tonight...

.An Arctic airmass will move across the Great Lakes tonight
through Friday which will develop bands of lake effect snow
showers. Bands will be largely disorganized most of the night,
but may develop into a few primary bands before sunrise. The
exact location of these are still uncertain.

* WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.

* WHERE...Southern Erie county.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will continue to fall to near
10 degrees tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY
